Description: Fountain brings hiring into one place so you can hire faster, whether your company is gig economy, franchise, or a small business.
Name: FountainHR

Methods.Name: Get Applicant
Methods.Description: Returns details of an applicant by ID.

Methods.Name: Delete Applicant
Methods.Description: Deletes the details of an applicant by ID.

Methods.Name: Update Applicant
Methods.Description: Update the details of an existing applicant.

Methods.Name: Get Transition History
Methods.Description: Returns the transition history of an applicant.

Methods.Name: Get Interview Sessions
Methods.Description: Returns the interview sessions for an applicant.

Methods.Name: Get Applicants Documents
Methods.Description: Returns the documents associated with an applicant.

Methods.Name: Advance Applicant
Methods.Description: Moves an applicant to an appropriate stage if specified or to the next stage by default.

Methods.Name: Get New Applicants
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all applicants added since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Recently Advanced Applicants
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all applicants advanced to a different stage since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Openings
Methods.Description: Get a list of all openings.

Methods.Name: List Openings Stages
Methods.Description: Get a list of all stages of an opening.
